name: gmoonc
description: Goalmoon Ctrl (gmoonc): Complete dashboard installer for React projects

scripts.build: tsup src/cli/index.ts --format cjs --no-splitting --out-dir dist && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const distDir='dist';const files=fs.readdirSync(distDir);const indexFile=files.find(f=>(f.startsWith('index')&&(f.endsWith('.js')||f.endsWith('.cjs'))));if(indexFile){const oldPath=path.join(distDir,indexFile);const newPath=path.join(distDir,'index.cjs');if(oldPath!==newPath){fs.renameSync(oldPath,newPath);}const content=fs.readFileSync(newPath,'utf8');if(!content.startsWith('#!/usr/bin/env node')){fs.writeFileSync(newPath,'#!/usr/bin/env node\n'+content)}}"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
